Package source.Database

Class SuggestionDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
source.Database.BaseDaoImpl
source.Database.SuggestionDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SuggestionDao
public class SuggestionDaoImpl extends BaseDaoImpl implements SuggestionDao
The SuggestionDaoImpl implements the functions of SuggestionDao using the DAO Design Pattern.
Since:
11/23/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      protected void readFile(String filePath)
      Reads a file and deserializes it using the suggestion deserializer. Updates the staff list stored in this class.
      Overrides:
      readFile in class BaseDaoImpl
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file for reading
      See Also:
      • SuggestionDeserializer

    • readSuggestion

      public Suggestion readSuggestion(DatabaseQuery query)
      Searches the database to see if the suggestion name exists (it is assumed that suggestion names are unique according to the FAQ).
      Specified by:
      readSuggestion in interface SuggestionDao
      Parameters:
      query - the query into our database
      Returns:
      the suggestion object associated with that suggestion name, null if there is no found entry.

      Parameters:
      queries - the queries into our database
      Returns:

    • readSuggestions

      public ArrayList<Suggestion> readSuggestions(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all suggestions that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Specified by:
      readSuggestions in interface SuggestionDao
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of suggestions if found, an empty list if not.
